trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Core.MultiBufferMemoryStream</codeEntityReference> class with the specified buffer manager.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Core.MultiBufferMemoryStream</codeEntityReference> class with the specified buffer manager.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.IBufferManager</codeEntityReference> to use to acquire and return buffers for the stream.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.IBufferManager</codeEntityReference> to use to acquire and return buffers for the stream.

trans-unit.source: The buffer size to use for each block.
trans-unit.target: The buffer size to use for each block.

trans-unit.source: Note that this parameter is disregarded when an <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.IBufferManager</codeEntityReference> is specified.
trans-unit.target: Note that this parameter is disregarded when an <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.IBufferManager</codeEntityReference> is specified.
